Go Back Review Name: Delightful Review Description: Excellent product from voltas and good delivery service from flipkart but installation service from Jeeves is very poor which spoils the overall experience. I think after sales service should b taken care in online sales. And even if u buy from a authorise retailer they are providing u addition 4 year of service online but this facility is not available with flipkart buyers only, i dont know why such partiality. Rest overall flipkart service is excellent.
